programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Series introduction and the study of Earth from orbit. The sky above is littered with stars and countless galaxies. It is where we come from and where we are destined to return. The first phase of this journey is complete, now commences the second, with robotics, advanced technologies and sheer daring we are now going where before we only dreamt.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The Moon, our closest celestial companion. Our indispensible dance partner through the cosmos. Lighting our night sky and gently tugging at our shores. Few have walked on her surface, though her allure remains strong, once again we are glancing her way with renewed interest and with a view to return very soon.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: If you ever go camping there is one thing you do not want to leave home without, the SWISS ARMY KNIFE! Well explain how it evolved into the most famous knife in the world and how the companys name got "CUT" together! And where did the term CUP OF JOE come from as well as the word JAVA? And we all love a juicy HAMBURGER, so where did these chopped meat patties come from?

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Learn how ALMOND NUTS get transformed into "MILK." And why are movie TRAILERS shown at the beginning of the film? Well keep your attention so youll want to stick around for the answer. And learn how detergents make your clothes SEEM brighter and whiter.

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: From the skyscrapers of Shanghai to the mountainous peaks of "The Last Shangri-La", explore the breathtaking landscape of this incredible country and connect with the people that infuse Chinas everyday life with flavor, passion and prosperity. Through the eyes of a cultural academic, a laborer, an architect, an urban planner, and a photographer, the grand evolution of a little fishing village is illustrated and documented to reveal one of the fastest growing megacities in the world. And while the physical landscape gracefully moves towards the future, beliefs, behaviors, and practices are put into test. The changes brought by the Thirty Year Miracle are indeed immense, and it has left no stone, no life, unturned.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: China Uncovered is a documentary exploring the changing culture of China, from everyday life to nature and cities, from tradition to modernism. Discover this country from the perspective of locals, including a photographer, a laborer and an architect. Witness how Shanghai turned into a mega city from a small fishing village, and how is that affecting the everyday life and traditional practices and beliefs.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.desc: Rosemary catches up with the conservancys rarest large carnivore, a coalition of 3 male cheetahs. The Pungwe pack get waist deep into their hunting as they pursue a wildebeest into a water pan. Denning season has begun. The pack are on the hunt for impala. Rosemary deals with a shocking snare removal. The splinters take on another herd of wildebeest.

programme.title: Capture Wild School
programme.desc: Very quick intro to the history of the course and the make up of the influx of new students as well as a look at some of the lecturers and their characters. Darting practice and drug theory: Students practice with dart guns from certain distances and learn the theory of dangerous drugs. The next step is learning to dart from a helicopter. A moving target is towed by a vehicle, and students have 1 dart to prove their accuracy. Darting practice on donkeys: 3 teams are formed and they have 3 donkeys to dart and check all vital signs. Darting 2 young antelope: 2 students are chosen to dart a young Rhone antelope and young Sable needing medical attention.

programme.title: Capture Wild School
programme.desc: A student darter is selected to dart from the helicopter and soon a suitable giraffe is located. The dart location is perfect and the giraffe begins to slow down as the rest of the team jump into action. The giraffe becomes more of a challenge as it wrestles with the rope and breaks free. The drugs eventually take full effect and the giraffe is subdued. The team carry out all the checkups, take samples and reverse the drug in good time to see it run off in good health. The vet lecturers give the debrief and conclude with all the positives and negatives.

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: There are many fine examples of evolutionary history in the natural world. Animals adapt through a series of small, random mutations and usually do so in order to compete more effectively for food, water and space. Animals with certain adaptations are more likely to be stronger and therefore produce more young. Crocodiles are certainly of an ancient lineage, they are believed to be 200 million years old, whereas dinosaurs became extinct 64 million years ago. Crocodiles have an incredible ability to adapt and survive in the Race of Life. They have a very slow metabolism, and can go up to a year with no food. They also have a 4 chamber heart that helps them control their temperature, and lungs that allow them to hold their breath underwater for up to 2 hours. Sharks have gone through the process of adaptation and evolutionary experimentation as well. The modern descendants of ancient sharks have incorporated many of the successful traits of the past. They have changed over time, but the changes have not been too extreme, only nature perfecting an originally near perfect design. Whales are an amazing species that have evolved from land dwelling creatures millions of years ago to the marine mammals we know today. Over the course of their evolution whales have developed echolocation, thick layers of blubber, modified lungs, better hearing and larger arteries among other things to ensure their survival and prosperity.

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: Deserts are dry. Deserts are extreme. True deserts get less than 18 cm of rain per year. True deserts have very few plants. Semi-desert habitats have enough rainfall to support more plant and animal life. Either way, deserts are not easy places for animals to live. Desert animals have evolved to handle the deserts heat and lack of water. They have adapted their bodies and behaviors to the desert climate. Most can survive on small amounts of water and many get all of their water from their food. Some drink maybe once a week and travel considerable distances to find isolated waterholes and springs. Large animals seek shade during the hottest part of the day. Some animals dig a hollow depression into the ground and lie in the cooler soil while others are nocturnal. Many reptiles and other animals protect themselves from the extreme temperature by spending their time in burrows. The scorpion is one of the most ancient creatures on earth, in existence since life first crawled out of the sea. One look and you can see why theyre born survivors. Not only are their bodies armoured against the desert heat - and other predators - but all scorpions have pincers at the front and a poisonous sting at the end of their tail. Rattlesnakes can be two meters long. Theyre fast, tough and with a deadly venom, making them one of the most dangerous snakes in the world. But nobody seems to have told the Roadrunner, who regard rattlesnakes as quite suitable prey.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Chasing Tales
programme.desc: 3 wild dog packs are introduced, Pungwe, Mapura and Splinters pack. We see 16 Pungwe pups emerge for the first time out of their den site. The motorbike camera crew manage to record their first successful wild dog hunt. Rosemary and Jess are urgently called out to dart and remove the snare from one of the dogs. Another hunt is recorded by the motorbike and filming drone crew.

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Disasters in the air and misfortunes at sea grab our attention because of the unusually large number of fatalities involved. But its not even necessary to leave dry land for a terrible disaster to happen. Rail journeys and even just getting in your car can be fraught with disaster. Thats the focus for this instalment of Desperate Hours - road and rail disasters. We will examine the causes of such accidents, be that the powers of nature or human folly. We are about to explore the worst of the worst destructive events from an ordinary day on Nigerian roads to a disastrous display of human error in Santiago de Compostella when the driver of a loaded passenger train went about 115 km/h over the established speed limit and drove his train straight into a wall. So buckle up; youre in for a bumpy ride…

programme.title: WWII Documentary Films
programme.desc: Award-winning documentary films produced to enlighten future generations about the personal stories of the WWII generations.

programme.title: The Polar School of Nomad Children
programme.desc: 360° GEO- Report visits the Nenets, the last true nomads on earth, on their remote Russian peninsula. Every August, on the Russian polar peninsula of Yamal, children of reindeer shepherds await a helicopter that will bring them back to school after the summer holidays. For the main part of the year, 600 nomad children from the indigenous people of the Nenet live and learn separated from their parents. Up until now, their home Yamal was an of Russia that was far from any semblance of civilization- until an enormous gas pool was discovered beneath the tundra. Now, destroyed nature and gigantic industrial plants are a common sight along the nomads track - but this industrial development is also offering new opportunities to their children.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager

Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: "Special Operations" are special divisions of military, police or intelligence services that are highly qualified in specific areas of urban warfare and in a variety of special weapons and technology. Over the past forty years, all of the worlds superpowers have built up these groups in order to better fight wars, to counter terrorism and to conduct high-stakes police actions. This episode examines the history of such organizations, from the Green Berets, WWII paratroopers and naval special warfare units through to the Seal Team 6, the British SAS, and private contractors, including Black Water and Brown and Root. Showing how these operators are trained, how they plan, and what weaponry and tactical gear they use, the introductory episode of CQB provides viewers with a fast-paced overview of the techniques, strategies and equipment that have been successfully used by Military Special Operations.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: For over 24 years, East Timor (now known as Timor Leste) endured a crushing occupation inflicted on them by neighbouring Indonesia on the pretext of the fight against communism. The war was brought to a controversial conclusion in 1999. However, trauma from that period lives on as evidenced by the testimonies of Nelson Belo, Gregorio Saldanha and Pascal Oliveira, survivors of the infamous 1991 Santa Cruz Massacre. This film recalls the trauma of Timor Leste in this the tenth anniversary of its independence.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: The county of Flintshire in Wales is said to be a land filled with ghosts and haunts. Plas Teg is said to be one of the "most haunted" houses in the area. With over 400 years of history, this place is sure to be the home of many an entity.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters travel to Hull to investigate ghostly goings on inside of a former chocolate factory. The investigation turns out to be no picnic, as the ghosts haunting make direct contact with the team.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Un-Belizable! Were off on a Central American Mayan excursion. We head up the steps of the ancient high temple at Lamanai. Then we take a city tour of the main tourist destination, Belize City. We learn about Belizes colonial roots at the Belize City History Museum and dive the amazing Blue Hole.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Nicknamed the Garden of Eden, this volcanic caldera is home to over 25,000 big game animals. Here survival isnt just a game—its a matter of life and death. Youll witness one of the great acts of nature—buffalo, lion and hyena in a face-to-face struggle for dominance. Life in the crater can take surprising twists.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Nairobi is the capital of Kenya and one of the most fascinating cities in Africa. On our visit well see the colonial architecture of a bygone era and the ultra-modern side of town as well. Well learn the truth behind the "Out of Africa" story and our host gets eye-to-eye with some endangered giraffes.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: In open sea, along the Venezuelan coastline, we fly over the biggest coral atoll of the Caribbean Sea to then dive into these beautiful waters: this is the archipelago of Los Roques, surrounded by an immense coral reef that protects it from the Atlantic waves and makes it an ideal place for divers. We make our base in Gran Roque, the biggest and highest island of the archipelago and we dive into the crystal clear waters of the Los Roques National Park. Forests of coral and sea fans or gorgonian are the romantic frame for a group of box fish, busy with their courtship dances, but it is the fascination of the queen of the seas, a Manta Ray that steal the underwater scene here on Los Roques. Out of the water we sail in and around the island channels that are bordered by mangrove forests, which are full of marine life, such as the Giant Caribbean Star Fish.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: On board of the strangest Cessna in the whole of Venezuela. Vittorio, a man who feels that his personal space is more in the air rather than on the round, is taking us from the North to the South, leaving from Gran Roque Island. We first fly over the Los Roques archipelago, to then land on a runway made of sand, on the island of La Tortuga, a long strip of land and sand that is inhabited only by a few fishermen. Flying again we follow the waterways of this region and re-fuel in Ciudad Bolivar, a city on the banks of the great Orinoco river, we then fly over the vast and savage territory of the Gran Sabana dominated by the Tepuy and the famous Canaima waterfall, until we reach our final destination: The Salto Angel, the highest waterfall in the world, which is named after its discoverer, the pilot Jimmy Angel, the idol of our friend Vittorio.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: This show features some segments that didnt fit in their respective episodes. We play around at the Pinball Museum in Las Vegas. Then, we salute the Commander in Chief at the Presidential Hall of Fame in Clermont, FL. Also, well swim with real mermaids at Weeki Wachee Springs in Central Florida, and cheer on Teddy Ballgame at the Ted Williams Hitters Hall of Fame.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We set sail to the land of the Norseman in Oslo, Norway. Well climb the fort walls at Akershus Fortress and discover the North and South Poles at the Fram Museum. Then, well unearth ancient viking ship treasures at the Viking Ship Museum, and well brave the open waters of the Pacific with Thor Heyerdahl at the Kon-tiki museum.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The Moon, our closest celestial companion. Our indispensible dance partner through the cosmos. Lighting our night sky and gently tugging at our shores. Few have walked on her surface, though her allure remains strong, once again we are glancing her way with renewed interest and with a view to return very soon.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: They orbit between us and our Star, the inner worlds; hidden within the suns glare often only visible at sunrise or sunset. Venus the first and brightest star in the evening sky, and Mercury fleeting across the solar disk. They are half of our solar systems terrestrial planets yet we know so little. As we begin to take a closer look at our companions they are posing more questions than answers.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Wow, I Never Knew That! is a whimsical, half-hour television series that is jam-packed with exciting tidbits and fascinating facts that uncover the truths and origins behind the stuff youre already familiar with. From the items you use every day to the phrases you use in conversation to the habits youre so accustomed to, youll be fascinated to learn how theyve all really come about! Learn how a pharmacist and an accountant created the most famous drink in the world, COCA COLA! And, learn the "BEAR" truth behind how a U.S. president helped create everyones favorite stuffed toy, THE TEDDY BEAR! Then, how did a piece of wire accidentally "SLINK" its way to become a fantastic fun toy for children? Plus, how a the WIFFLE BALL was invented.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: On a hot summers day, nothing cools you down like a frozen fruity POPSICLE! Youll learn how an 11-year old boy created this sweet icy treat! And, have you ever noticed those colored spinning poles outside the BARBERSHOP? Youll be in STITCHES when you learn how they got their start! Plus, find out how a melting chocolate bar gave way to the invention of the MICROWAVE!

programme.title: Water: H2O Stories
programme.desc: Water: H2O Stories is a 3x52 series revisiting the story of water on planet Earth and its disrupted course over time which has led to the 21st century biggest challenge.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Filmed using crystal clear High Definition technology, The Blue Realm takes the viewer on a fascinating and breath-taking journey of discovery beneath the waves to examine the unique biology and extraordinary behaviour of undersea animals. Filmed by expert divers with a passion for marine life and environment, the compelling stories and captivating creatures come from many locations around the world including Papua New Guinea, Palau, South Africa, the Red Sea, the Great Barrier Reef, the Bahamas, Cocos Island, British Columbia, Texas, Indonesia, the Socorro Archipelago, California and Florida.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Filmed using crystal clear High Definition technology, The Blue Realm takes the viewer on a fascinating and breath-taking journey of discovery beneath the waves to examine the unique biology and extraordinary behaviour of undersea animals. Filmed by expert divers with a passion for marine life and environment, the compelling stories and captivating creatures come from many locations around the world including Papua New Guinea, Palau, South Africa, the Red Sea, the Great Barrier Reef, the Bahamas, Cocos Island, British Columbia, Texas, Indonesia, the Socorro Archipelago, California and Florida.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.desc: A resident baboon on one of the ranches requires some human help to extract a snare. The splinters pack run into a coalition of cheetahs. Jess visits the new-born Splinters pups. Pungwe are on the hunt for big game as they take on formidable buffalo. The Splinters once again demonstrate their extraordinary hunting tactics.

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray Mears explores the Great Barrier Reef starting on the Queensland mainland taking a boat out to Hervey Bay with whale expert Wally Franklin. They witness a mother hump back whale teaching her three month old calf the whale moves needed to survive the long migration to Antarctica.He flies out to Lady Elliot Island at the southernmost tip of the Great Barrier Reef where he goes scuba diving on the coral reef and discovers giant turtles and manta rays and shoals of big eyed trevelly fish.Back on the island Ray helps marine biologist Maggie ONeal plant a Pisonia tree and finds out how the Pisonia trees kill the Black Noddy birds that nest in them in order to use their corpses as a fertile compost given the unforgiving ground of a coral island.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray Mears journeys into the remote wilderness region of Arnhem land to the Cooper Creek Billabong. Hes there during the dry season and all the wild life is concentrated into a narrow stretch of water. He comes face to face with the dominant saltwater crocodile and watches as the croc manoeuvres a dead pig down river to a secret hiding place. When Ray gets too close warns him off.Ray travels into Stone Country above the Billabong where he finds a gallery of ancient Aboriginal art and joins locals Connie Nayinggul and her grandson Moses on a fishing expedition. They catch a barramundi and cook the fish in a traditional ground oven using paper bark.Finally Ray travels with land manager Greg Towns across the dried up mudflats through giant flocks of Magpie Geese. Ray helps Greg to burn away large meadows of alien and destructive grass that is killing the birds. In a dramatic scene Ray witnesses the spectacle of farming with fire.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: In Victoria just south west of Melbourne in the You Yangs National Park Ray Mears meets up with researcher Janine Duffy in a dry eucalyptus forest. They go in search of koalas and find a young male who nervously tries to establish his own territory.Ray moves down to the open grasslands and tracks a mob of Eastern Grey kangaroos. He visits the Mount Rothwell Conservation Reserve and meets an unusual marsupial - a predator - that is almost extinct on the mainland of Australia - a Tiger Quoll - smaller relative of the Tasmanian Devil. Finally Ray journeys through a Wet Eucalyptus forest to Lake Elizabeth and canoeing across the quiet waters finds himself surrounded by rare and unique duck billed platypuses

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: Animal Doctors
programme.desc: Explore how animals developed over time and generations their own medicine and health care strategies. How have these been passed onto early humans ? Questioning traditional boundaries between human and animal, we will travel from Central African Republic, to Tanzania, from the US to France with the leading experts in animal behaviour. Todays science revisits the birth of animal intelligence and culture.

programme.title: Herding Sheep In Iceland
programme.desc: Starting at the beginning of September, the Northern Lights unveil their magical patterns on Icelands starry skies. At the same time, Icelanders celebrate the "Retir": sheep and horses are herded to the lowlands. 4,500 sheep and 800 horses spend 3 to 4 months in the untamed highlands. Now, they are rounded up. No single farmer can herd so many animals to the lowlands. The entire community helps.

programme.title: Coral Sea Dreaming
programme.desc: Coral Sea Dreaming enters into the very heart of life - and death - on a coral reef. It is a story that spans 500 million years and stars some of the most exotic and wonderous marine creatures on earth. Coral is the planets greatest natu- ral architect, and coral reefs boast the highest biodiversity of any ecosystem.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: As warfare has evolved, many military techniques and technologies have been adapted for use in urban settings by police units around the world. This episode provides viewers with an intimate perspective on what it feels like to be "inside the heads" of special police personnel, and how their use of military-style strategies and equipment allows them to save lives. From riot control in South Africa and the lessons learned from its excesses, to Los Angeles Police Chief Robert Gates creation of an elite police S.W.A.T team, CQB will showcase how, over the past 30 years, the fight against urban crime has evolved into a military scenario, with both sides using increasingly complex weaponry and tactics.

programme.title: Bagātie un bezkaunīgie
programme.desc: Stāsts par NBA zvaigznes Lorenzena Raita brutālo slepkavību un cīņu par taisnīgumu, ko skatītājiem izstāstīts viņa māte, draugi un pat izmeklētājs, kas apņēmies atklāt šo neatrisināto lietu.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Bruklinā metro vagonā atrasts nošauts atvaļināts policists. Izmeklētāji drīz atklāj, ka viņa nāve ir saistīta ar divām apšaudēm pēdējo 13 stundu laikā. Tā kā upuri šķietami izvēlēti nejauši, policija uztraucas, ka par nākamo mērķi varētu kļūt jebkurš ņujorkietis. Vitāli svarīgi ir izsekot jebkuru aizdomās turamo, pirms viņš atkal uzbrūk.

programme.desc: Kad Ziemassvētku laikā tiek noslepkavota kāda māte, izmeklētāji atklāj mīlas trīsstūri. Tas šokē viņas ģimeni un uz visiem laikiem atņem viņiem svētku prieku.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Kad radinieku strīds par naudu pārvēršas dubultslepkavībā, visa Bruklina ir nomodā izgaisušās slepkavas dēļ. Dienas pārvēršas mēnešos un pēc tam gados, jo Ņujorkas policijas medības pārvēršas par bēgļa vajāšanu valsts un starptautiskā mērogā.

programme.title: Bagātie un bezkaunīgie
programme.desc: "Maverick" saspēles vadītāja Breta Favra slava un bagātība uzņēmusi drūmu noti: viņš iesaistījies labklājības fonda skandālā, apdraudot viņa grūtā darbā nopelnīto.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Trīsdesmit gadus pēc trim šausmīgām slepkavībām, pazīstama DNS un ķermeņa ekshumēšanas beidzot izbeidz lietu.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Luiziānas naktsklubā tiek atrasts nežēlīgi nogalināts vīrietis. Ar roku rakstītā zīmīte, kas piesūcināta ar upura asinīm, vēsta: "Tu man pielaidi AIDS." Policijai ir vairāk jautājumu nekā atbilžu. Vai tas bija naida noziegums? Vai slepkava uzbruks atkal?

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Kad vīrietis tiek noslepkavots tieši pirms Ziemassvētkiem, viņa ģimene palīdz Talsas izmeklētājiem atrast viņa slepkavas.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Pusaugu zēns Helovīna rītā mājās atklāj reālu šausmu skatu, un drīz vien saprot, ka tā nav brīvdienu palaidnība.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Kad radinieku strīds par naudu pārvēršas dubultslepkavībā, visa Bruklina ir nomodā izgaisušās slepkavas dēļ. Dienas pārvēršas mēnešos un pēc tam gados, jo Ņujorkas policijas medības pārvēršas par bēgļa vajāšanu valsts un starptautiskā mērogā.

programme.title: Bagātie un bezkaunīgie
programme.desc: "Maverick" saspēles vadītāja Breta Favra slava un bagātība uzņēmusi drūmu noti: viņš iesaistījies labklājības fonda skandālā, apdraudot viņa grūtā darbā nopelnīto.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Mobilā ātra naudas afēra beidzas ar dubultu slepkavību. Jauniņais slepkavību izmeklētājs to uztver personīgi.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Oklahomas štata Talsas policijas izmeklētājs izseko sadistisku slepkavu - kāds nogalinājis vīrieša brāli, kas nozaga kravas automašīnu.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Bīstama lēmuma rezultātā tiek nošauts vidusskolnieks. Bet kurš izšāva nāvējošo lodi? Detektīvi mēģina apsteigt laiku, lai atklātu patiesību.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Māte tiek brutāli nošauta, vedot savus dēlus mājās no Pateicības dienas svinībām. Kad viņas slepkavas medības noved līdz maz ticamam aizdomās turamajam, izmeklētāji apjauš, ka viņas slepkavība nav tik nejauša, kā sākotnēji šķita.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Tūlīt pēc Ziemassvētkiem mājās Floridā tiek atrasts noslepkavots jauns pāris. Kaimiņi nevar apjaust, ka pāris šajā apgabalā mitinājušies tik ilgi, lai iegūtu nāvīgu ienaidnieku.

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: Dino un Klāra Pantāzes veiksmīgi nodarbojas ar ķīlu biznesu, un viņu 20 gadus ilgā laulība šķietami ir ideāla. Kad Klāra mājās tiek nošauta, izmeklētāji prāto, vai vainīgs nav dusmīgs klients, vai arī viņu pasakā slēpjas kas vairāk.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Miljonārei baņķierei un divu bērnu mātei Šēlai Kovlinai bija viss. Bija, līdz viņa nāvējoši paslīdēja un nokrita savā Upper West Side apartamenta vannasistabā. Dažas dienas pēc viņas apbedīšanas tiek saņemta kāda informācija, un policija saprot, ka tas, iespējams, nav bijusi nejaušība.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Linda Steina bija slavenību nekustamo īpašumu māklere, viņa pārdeva Ņujorkas luksusa dzīvokļus Stīvenam Spīlbergam, Brūsam Vilisam un Betei Midlerei. Kad Linda tiek atrasta mirusi savā dzīvoklī, slepkavība nekavējoties kļūst par avīžu pirmo lapu ziņu. Viņas personība bija sarežģīta, un Linda bija ieguvusi kā ienaidniekus, tā cienītājus. Ar ierobežotiem pierādījumiem no nozieguma vietas, tikai rūpīga meklēšana var identificēt viņas slepkavu.

programme.title: Bagātie un bezkaunīgie
programme.desc: NBA zvaigznes Denisa Rodmena superzvaigznes statuss, ko viņš ieguva ar sava lielā talanta un trakoto ballīšu palīdzību, padarīja viņu neaizsargātu pret nodevībām un zādzībām no tuvāko cilvēku puses.

programme.title: Bagātie un bezkaunīgie
programme.desc: Stāsts par amerikāņu ikonu un pasaulslaveno cīkstoni Halku Hoganu. Viņam bija viss - pielūdzēji, nauda, ​​mīloša ģimene, pat savs TV šovs... Kad plašsaziņas līdzekļos noplūda bēdīgi slavenaais seksa ieraksts, tas uz visiem laikiem mainīja viņa dzīvi. Atklāsim skandālus ārpus ringa, nemitīgās ķildas un cīņu par privātumu.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Vīrieša vecāki tiek atrasti miruši, un viņš dara visu iespējamo, lai netiktu pieķerts, taču Luminols atklāj svarīgu pavedienu.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Koduma pēdas siera blokā ir atslēga, lai notvertu slepkavu, kad viņš izlemj panašķoties pēc iebrukuma mājās.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Kāds vīrietis uzstāj, ka viņa pazudušie vecāki ir atvaļinājumā, taču viņu mājās tiesu medicīnas izmeklēšana liecina par ļaunu uzbrukumu.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: 14 gadus vecā Keitija Tarboksa un slepenpoliciste Mišela Dīrija iesaistās kopīgā misijā: atklāt noslēpumus par seksuālajiem uzbrucējiem internetā. Cik tālu viņas dosies, lai uzzinātu, vai viņu tiešsaistes spēļu biedri ir īsti vai vienkārši spēlē savdabīgu pavedināšanas spēli?

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Izmeklētāji atklāj nacionālu pagrīdes organizāciju, kas sniedz biedriem konkrētus norādījumus, kā organizēt "nāves notikumus", lai netiktu atklāti. Cik daudzi nomirs, pirms atklās patiesību?

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džejs nevēlas neko vairāk kā klusu dzimšanas dienu, makšķerējot pie ezera, taču ģimene vēlas viņam lielus svētkus. Savā izmisīgajā cīņā, lai visu sakārtotu, Klēra un Mičels nonāk ieslodzījumā savas bērnības pagalmā. programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Teds
programme.desc: Teds un Džons pieliek ārkārtīgi daudz pūļu, lai Džons varētu noskatīties savu pirmo pieaugušo filmu.

programme.title: Teds
programme.desc: Tuvojoties mācību gada beigām, Teds plāno palīdzēt Džonam zaudēt nevainību.

programme.title: Teds
programme.desc: Kad Metijs liek Tedam doties uz skolu kopā ar Džonu, Teds nekavējoties nolemj tikt izslēgts.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Glorija palīdz Filam noskaidrot, kāpēc Klēra uz viņu ir dusmīga. Mičels aizmirst izsūtīt ielūgumus Kamerona ziedojumu vākšanai. Alekss mēģina pierādīt, ka Heilija melo, kad viņa saka, ka viņai ir viesmīles darbs.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fils pavada dienu spa, bet Klēra mēģina aizvietot Heilijas mīļāko džemperi. Kamerons atklāj Mičela netīro noslēpumu par Lilijas adopciju. Džejs un Glorija strīdas par savu pēdējo atdusas vietu.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Filam un Klērai ir zināmas bailes - viņi uzzina, ka Lūks ir sadraudzējies ar viņu veco kaimiņu, misteru Klezaku. Džeja mēģinājums izvairīties no simfoniskā koncerta kopā ar Gloriju un Meniju nokļūst Mičela un Kamerona "puišu vakara" vidū. Heilijai ir savi piedzīvojumi, auklējot Liliju.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fila jaunā nekustamā īpašuma reklāma rada apmulsumu Klērai un Heilijai. Kamerons pārsteidz, vadot skolas mūziklu. Džeja brālis ierodas pilsētā ar pārsteidzošām ziņām.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Mičels un Kamerons mēģina atrast Lilijas aizbildni, ja ar viņiem kaut kas notiks. Klēra baidās, ka Lūks izrādīsies kā Fils. Heilija veido saikni ar Aleksu, jo viņa ir spiesta vest Aleksu uz čella spēli.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Atskats uz laiku, kad Rejs un Debra pirmo reizi pārcēlās pāri ielai no Marijas un Frenka.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs ir šokā, uzzinot, ka ģimene viņam melojusi par uzstāšanos televīzijā sporta tērzēšanas šovā. Kad viņš iegūst otru iespēju piedalīties, viņa ģimene nolemj, ka pienācis laiks sniegt viņam dažus norādījumus, kā ar konkrētām frāzēm labot viņa neveiklību.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Allija nepakļaujas Rejam un Debrai. Viņa nedara to, ko viņai liek, viņa ir vienmēr sliktā garastāvoklī. Rejs mēģina noskaidrot, kādēļ tā.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Roberts ir nomākts, jo ir pienākusi viņa šķiršanās gadadiena. Marija un Frenks cenšas panākt, lai Rejs uzmundrināšanas dēļ aizved Robertu uz kino.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Kad pēc trīs nodarbībām Allijai klavierspēle kļūst garlaicīga, Rejs nolemj pasniegt mācību par nepadošanos, jo nevēlas, lai viņa tik ātri zaudētu interesi. Viņš lūdz Mariju atkal iemācīt viņam pašam spēlēt klavieres.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri

programme.title: Teds
programme.desc: Kad Metijs liek Tedam doties uz skolu kopā ar Džonu, Teds nekavējoties nolemj tikt izslēgts.

programme.title: Teds
programme.desc: Ir 1993. gads, un lāča Teda slavas brīdis ir pagājis. Viņš dzīvo mājās kopā ar savu labāko draugu Džonu Benetu un viņa ģimeni. Lai gan Teds var slikti ietekmēt Džonu, viņš ir lojāls draugs, kurš noteikti centīsies draudzības dēļ.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Deivids Volless nosūta Maiklu komandējumā uz Vinipegu, cenšoties palīdzēt viņam aizmirst par Hollijas pārcelšanu. Pema atklāj Džimam, ka viņa nenokārtoja pārbaudījumu, un viņai jāpaliek Ņujorkā.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Kad Maikls atklāj, ka vadība atgriezusi Tobiju, lai aizstātu Holiju, viņš mēģina pierādīt, ka viņam ir narkotikas, tā panākot viņa atlaišanu. Pemai ir problēmas ar pretīgo mikroviļņu krāsni. Visbeidzot Džims pārsteidz Pemu, nopērkot savu vecāku māju.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Kad Maikls atklāj, ka vadība atgriezusi Tobiju, lai aizstātu Holiju, viņš mēģina pierādīt, ka viņam ir narkotikas, tā panākot viņa atlaišanu. Pemai ir problēmas ar pretīgo mikroviļņu krāsni. Visbeidzot Džims pārsteidz Pemu, nopērkot savu vecāku māju.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maiklam līdz dienas beigām ir jāiztērē biroja pārpalikums, taču viņš nevar izšķirties starp kopētāju vai jauniem krēsliem. Dvaits izspēlē netīru triku Andželai un Endijam, viņiem gatavojoties kāzām biešu fermā.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Filisa šantažē Andželu darīt Ziemassvētku ballītes darbu, ko Maikls pārvērš par iejaukšanos pēc tam, kad Meredita piedzeras un aizdedzina matus. Tikmēr Dvaits veic krāpšanos ar populāru Ziemassvētku dāvanu.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Draugi

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als nevēlas kastrēt suni Baku, neskatoties uz to, ka daudzi kaimiņi viņam draud ar tiesvedību par Baka "nakts miesas darbībām" - to rezultātā viņu suņiem ir "stulbi, neglīti kucēni". Reaģējot uz Pegijas spiedienu un dīvainu sapni, Als pieņem lēmumu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Kamēr Ala un Stīva prātu aizņem darbiniece, kas labo Bandiju ledusskapi, Pegija uzaicina Mārsiju kopā ar meitenēm uz striptīzklubu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Mārsija zaudē mieru un laulības gredzenu - tas ieslīd dejotāja biksēs, kad viņa viņam iedod dzeramnaudu. Izmisīgi nevēloties saņemt ziņas no Stīva, Mārsija cenšas novērst viņa uzmanību katru reizi, kad viņai rodas iespēja. Tomēr Zorro struptīzdejotājs pēkšņi parādās Ala mājā un atdod viņam Mārsija laulības gredzenu. Viņš atdod to Stīvam un pastāsta par to, kur Mārsija bija šonakt.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Alu šokē lielais telefona rēķins un viņš atsakās to maksāt. Tiek atvienota Bandiju tālruņa līnija, padarot viņu par Pegijas, bērnu un Rodas naida upuri. Vēl ļaunāk ir tas, ka Alu traucē arī ielu apgaismojums, kas katru nakti neļauj viņam aizmigt.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als izgāžas rakstiskajā autovadītāju pārbaudē tajā pašā dienā, kad Kellija nokārto savu testu. Tādējādi viņš kļuvis bezpalīdzīgs un nespēj nokļūt hipodromā, lai noskatītos svarīgas zirgu sacīkstes.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Seriāla noslēdzošajā sezonā Austrijas ķeizariene Sisi turpina dzīvot starp ilgām pēc brīvības un pienākumiem pret impēriju. Pēc Korfu pārciesta smaga kritiena no zirga Sisi atgriežas vecāku māja Posenhofenā. Pēc tēva nāves atklājas ģimenes noslēpumi, un Sisi nākas cīnīties par ģimenes īpašuma saglabāšanu. Tikmēr Francis gaida Sisi atgriešanos galmā. Starp abiem briest jaunas nesaskaņas. Vai viņu mīlestību vēl būs iespējams glābt?

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Seriāla noslēdzošajā sezonā Austrijas ķeizariene Sisi turpina dzīvot starp ilgām pēc brīvības un pienākumiem pret impēriju. Pēc Korfu pārciesta smaga kritiena no zirga Sisi atgriežas vecāku māja Posenhofenā. Pēc tēva nāves atklājas ģimenes noslēpumi, un Sisi nākas cīnīties par ģimenes īpašuma saglabāšanu. Tikmēr Francis gaida Sisi atgriešanos galmā. Starp abiem briest jaunas nesaskaņas. Vai viņu mīlestību vēl būs iespējams glābt?

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija ir nonākušas līdz savu spēju robežai, jo visiem ir alibi. Vai izdosiet uzzināt, kurš nogalināja seru Pīteru, pirms cieš vēl kāds cits?

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Atrodoties Londonā, Mērdoks, Ogdena un Suzanna cieš bumbas sprādzienā, ko, visticamāk, izraisīja nu jau mirusi sufražete.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks un Vats mēģinājumus aizsargāt dārgu rubīnu, kas paredzēts jaunam muzejam, apdraud apņēmīgi zagļi.

programme.title: Bīstamā draudzība
programme.desc: Kad Linas hercogiene Marī de Rohana ierodas Francijas galmā, viņa ar izbrīnu atklāj, ka pēc četru gadu ilgas laulības Austrijas Anna un Luijs XIII vēl nav noslēguši laulību.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Viktoriāņi bija apsēsti ar nāvi un spiritismu. Šajā sērijā Elīzu nolīgst mirušo fotogrāfs, kurš saņem savādas un draudpilnas vēstules no mirušo pasaules.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Šī ir nozīmīga diena Tristanam, taču sāpīgs noslēpums draud izjaukt svinības un Džeimsa centieni aizsargāt Helēnu no savām problēmām tikai pasliktina situāciju.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Ir Jaungada vakars, un uz kluba grīdas tiek atrasts populāras dziedātājas līķis. Mēs pagriežam laiku atpakaļ, un Peregrīne saprot, ka visu nakti ir vērojusi slepkavu, to neapzinoties.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Izsaukta no piekrastes mājām, lai pieprasītu savu noslēpumaino mantojumu, jaunā un ārprātīgā Peregrīna Fišere atklāj pasauli un mantojumu, ko atstājusi viņas tante Frīna.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza dodas uz cietumu Londonas nomalē. Viņa un Hercogs pārmeklē šķietami tukšu ēku, tomēr izrādās, ka tur slēpjas banda.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimsam ir jānokārto veci rēķini, kad Daroubijā atgriežas pazīstama seja, un Tristanam un Zigfrīdam ir jāatzīst savstarpējās atšķirības.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Atrodoties Londonā, Mērdoks, Ogdena un Suzanna cieš bumbas sprādzienā, ko, visticamāk, izraisīja nu jau mirusi sufražete.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Džeko Ārgails nomira cietumā, jo bija apcietināts par savas audžumātes slepkavību. Dr. Artūrs Kalgarijs pierāda, ka Džeko patiesībā slepkavības laikā bija kopā ar viņu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Kad kāds vīrs bez pases un saiknes ar Mārlovu tiek atrasts miris uz lauku ceļa, Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija pēta noslēpumus un spriedzi, kas valda starp vietējiem iedzīvotājiem.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Džeko Ārgails nomira cietumā, jo bija apcietināts par savas audžumātes slepkavību. Dr. Artūrs Kalgarijs pierāda, ka Džeko patiesībā slepkavības laikā bija kopā ar viņu.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Grāmattārps
programme.desc: Pirmajā dienā Buka asistenta amatā, pateicoties tuvumā notiekošajiem izrakumiem un Harkapa slepkavībai, Džeks saprot, ka viņa darba devējam ir negaidīta papildu aizraušanās - slepkavību risināšana.

programme.title: Hārdakri
programme.desc: Šis ir stāsts par strādnieku šķiras ģimenes Hārdakru dzīvi, mīlestību un ceļu uz bagātību 19. gs. beigu Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids meklē atbildes par noslēpumainu jaunu zēnu, kuru šķietami meklē pilnīgi visi. Samīrs paslēpj zēnu, un neviens nezina, ko īsti domāt par viņa uzrakstīto.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Ir 1963. gads, un leģendārais detektīvs Sems Speids bauda pensijas gadus Francijas dienvidos, tomēr baumas par sena ienaidnieka atgriešanos izjauc šo idilli.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Kad kāds vīrs bez pases un saiknes ar Mārlovu tiek atrasts miris uz lauku ceļa, Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija pēta noslēpumus un spriedzi, kas valda starp vietējiem iedzīvotājiem.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla atgriežas greznajā Bertrama viesnīcā Londonas sirdī un apjauš, ka patiesībā tā ir tumšāka nekā viņa bija iedomājusies, kad viena no tās kalponēm tiek atrasta noslepkavota.

programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ielejā iestājies pavasaris. Džeimss atgriežas Daroubijā, viņa prātu pārņēmusi Helēna un jāpieņem neiespējams lēmums. Tikmēr Tristanam ir jāsaprot, vai patiesība vienmēr ir labākā izvēle.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Tristans palīdz Zigfrīdam ar sarežģītu klientu un atgādina par to, kāds kādreiz bija viņš pats. Džeimss cer, ka pavasara ballē notikumi ar Helēnu virzīsies uz priekšu.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Jaunas atraitnes liktenis rada sarežģījumus Džeimsa un Helēnas romantiskajās attiecībās, bet Trikija Vū apmeklējums izraisa haosu Skeldeilā.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Šī ir nozīmīga diena Tristanam, taču sāpīgs noslēpums draud izjaukt svinības un Džeimsa centieni aizsargāt Helēnu no savām problēmām tikai pasliktina situāciju.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimsam ir jānokārto veci rēķini, kad Daroubijā atgriežas pazīstama seja, un Tristanam un Zigfrīdam ir jāatzīst savstarpējās atšķirības.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija tiek uzaicinātas palīdzēt policijai kā konsultantes un atklāj kādu svarīgu saikni starp slepkavībām.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Albergs un Gibsonas policijas nodaļa strādā, lai atrastu vainīgo, kad Kasandra nonāk dzīvībai bīstamā situācijā.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Kad pusaudži kādā bedrē atrod jaunas meitenes līķi, Dalgliešs un Miskina ierodas Norfolkā, lai palīdzētu, un galu galā tiek ievilkti lielākā slepkavības noslēpumā.

programme.title: Grāmattārps
programme.desc: Pirmajā dienā Buka asistenta amatā, pateicoties tuvumā notiekošajiem izrakumiem un Harkapa slepkavībai, Džeks saprot, ka viņa darba devējam ir negaidīta papildu aizraušanās - slepkavību risināšana.

programme.title: Komisārs Megrē
programme.desc: 1955. gada vasarā ar nazi tiek sadurta jauna sieviete, kas ir ceturtā nogalinātā dažu nedēļu laikā. Vai Megrē spēs atrast slepkavu pirms nākamā uzbrukuma?

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla atgriežas greznajā Bertrama viesnīcā Londonas sirdī un apjauš, ka patiesībā tā ir tumšāka nekā viņa bija iedomājusies, kad viena no tās kalponēm tiek atrasta noslepkavota.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Džeko Ārgails nomira cietumā, jo bija apcietināts par savas audžumātes slepkavību. Dr. Artūrs Kalgarijs pierāda, ka Džeko patiesībā slepkavības laikā bija kopā ar viņu.

programme.title: Grāmattārps
programme.desc: Pirmajā dienā Buka asistenta amatā, pateicoties tuvumā notiekošajiem izrakumiem un Harkapa slepkavībai, Džeks saprot, ka viņa darba devējam ir negaidīta papildu aizraušanās - slepkavību risināšana.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad bandas locekļa galva uzrodas uz boulinga celiņa, Peregrīne un Džeimss attopas divu Melburnas visnežēlīgāko pusaudžu bandu kara krustugunīs.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad baložu sacensību entuziasta ķermenis tiek atrasts nosmērēts ar darvu baložu mājā, Peregrīne un Džeimss dodas uz vienu no Melburnas piepilsētas baložu sacīkšu klubiem.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Banda satiekas pie upes, lai atpūstos un aizmirstu par problēmām, tomēr diena dabā beidzas ar slepkavību, kad Semjuls izmakšķerē līķi.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Ir Jaungada vakars, un uz kluba grīdas tiek atrasts populāras dziedātājas līķis. Mēs pagriežam laiku atpakaļ, un Peregrīne saprot, ka visu nakti ir vērojusi slepkavu, to neapzinoties.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Izsaukta no piekrastes mājām, lai pieprasītu savu noslēpumaino mantojumu, jaunā un ārprātīgā Peregrīna Fišere atklāj pasauli un mantojumu, ko atstājusi viņas tante Frīna.

programme.title: "Sanderson Farms Championship" – 1. kārta
programme.desc: The Sanderson Farms Championship is a professional golf tournament on the PGA Tour, played annually in Mississippi. It moved to the Country Club of Jackson in Jackson in autumn 2014, early in the 2015 season. The tournament has been part of the PGA Tour schedule since 1968, and has raised more than $7.3 million for statewide charities. Originally played at the Hattiesburg Country Club in Hattiesburg, the event moved in 1994 to Annandale Golf Club in Madison, which hosted through 2013.

programme.title: "Sanderson Farms Championship" – 3. kārta
programme.desc: The Sanderson Farms Championship is a professional golf tournament on the PGA Tour, played annually in Mississippi. It moved to the Country Club of Jackson in Jackson in autumn 2014, early in the 2015 season. The tournament has been part of the PGA Tour schedule since 1968, and has raised more than $7.3 million for statewide charities. Originally played at the Hattiesburg Country Club in Hattiesburg, the event moved in 1994 to Annandale Golf Club in Madison, which hosted through 2013.

Premier League. Arsenal - West Ham United
Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Новенькая
programme.desc: В элитную школу для детей богатых родителей попадает Вера - девушка из обычной семьи. Она сразу оказывается в центре запутанной детективной интриги и школьных конфликтов, и, конечно же, романтической истории. Но все не так просто: у Веры также есть тайна, и в элитном заведении она оказалась случайно...

programme.title: В последний раз прощаюсь
programme.desc: Жарким летним днём 24-летний Андрей спасает тонущую школьницу Веру. Девушка безответно влюбляется в своего спасителя, а тот видит в ней лишь маленькую застенчивую девчонку. Вскоре Андрей уезжает в город и женится на своей ровеснице.

programme.title: Двое над пропастью
programme.desc: В центре сюжета Рита Кушнир, которая перед свадьбой застает своего жениха Олега со своей сестрой. Свадьба отменяется, а у Риты в жизни начинается череда запутанных событий, когда она случайно спасает от самоубийства неизвестного мужчину.

programme.title: The Last Day of August
programme.desc: Dan (Michael Izquierdo) was paralyzed just over a year ago. Following months of recovery and overwhelmed by lifes new realities, he retreated to a family cabin in upstate New York. On the last day of August, his closest friends arrive unannounced to confront him about his recent reclusive and self-destructive behavior. Wanting to support him, yet skeptical of his psychological health, they attempt the tight-rope walk of loving confrontation in the hopes of convincing Dan to return home. Friendships are tested and love reveals itself in this independent drama about breaking down and breaking through. "The Last Day of August" is about the enduring power of love and friendship, and the struggle to overcome the mental and physical barriers that confront those living with addiction and disability. How we react to tragedy defines us, and when loved ones grapple with immense personal suffering, its not always apparent how to respond and whether the help we have to give is the help thats truly needed. This film is a personal examination of how destructive behaviors such as substance abuse and self-isolation emerge from trauma, and how one finds the strength to overcome.

programme.title: People You May Know
programme.desc: People You May Know follows Jed, a 30-something introvert who has managed to abstain from social media until now. When prompted with the gargantuan task of defining who he is, he realizes the life he can fake is much more interesting than the life he actually leads.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Sarah tells Paul that she wants out of their marriage; the next day she disappears. A year later and Paul along with their children return to his childhood town to start anew after the loss of his wife and their mother.

programme.title: Zen Noir
programme.desc: A nameless "noir" detective, still mourning the loss of his wife, investigates a mysterious death in a Buddhist temple, but his logical, left-brained crime-solving skills are useless in the intuitive, non-linear world of Zen.

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: Train Master
programme.desc: 62 year old Jeremiah Wilson is truly the Train Master of Willamette Western Railroad. He lives, breaths, and eats railroad. When Brett Banner, 32 year old heir to New York Eastern talks his dad into purchasing Willamette Western, there is immediately a clash between himself and Jeremiah. Jeremiah is fired by Brett two years from retirement and turns into a angry, depressed grandfather. When Bretts nine year old son Justin realizes Jeremiahs grandson Thomas can drive a locomotive, he kidnaps and holds Thomas favorite dinosaur ransom. Justin, Thomas and 3 other children board an old engine in for repairs and accidentally turns it into runaway engine causing a chain reaction of events.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: Irish Jam
programme.desc: Upon discovering that their town is up for sale, crafty Irish villagers scheme to raise the money to prevent the buy-out...

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
Hangman
programme.desc: A fisherman discovers an abandoned sailboat and decides to board. He finds no signs of life, but when he gets back on deck his own boat appears to have disappeared. What follows is an absolute nightmare.

programme.title: Land Of the Blind
programme.desc: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their countrys authoritarian government.

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: Musketeers Forever
programme.desc: A group of ex-secret agents opens a Jazz Club in Las Vegas. When they discover that a local Indian reservation is being threatened by a greedy and powerful gangster, they act. All for one, and one for all!

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: Uncle Nino
programme.desc: A distant, slightly dysfunctional family is brought closer together when the fathers long-estranged Uncle Nino comes from Italy to Chicago for a surprise visit.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: The Fire Dragon patrol, with their ever-supportive scoutmaster, is headed to Camp Rakhouta for what should be the best week of their lives. But when the "Team Spirit Stick" of the camp goes missing, the entire tradition of the camp is threatened.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Charlie, a culinary genius, has lost the motivation. He doesnt know what to with his life anymore, but he knows one thing - get close to Amber. In comparison to her boyfriend, he seems to be totally unattractive, but Charlies closest friend convinces him that where theres a will theres a way.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Two cop partners, who are also best friends attend a domestic disturbance, only for one to accidentaly critically wound the other. The rest of the police force are suspicious that there may have been no accident.

programme.title: When Do We Eat?
programme.desc: A familys Passover gets screwy after the patriarch unknowingly ingests a hit of Ecstasy.

programme.title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
programme.desc: Inspired by a true crime, a man begins to experience mystifying events that lead him to slay his mother with a sword.

programme.title: Black Cop
programme.desc: Follow the contradictory and challenging story of an African Canadian cop. He has been attacked by his fellow officers and becomes the victim of racial profiling. The policeman is struggling between duty and moral obligation, and is pushed over the edge. He decides to take revenge on his community.

programme.title: Spoža talanta nepanesamais smagums
programme.desc: Nikolass Keidžs jūtas radoši nepiepildīts un atrodas bankrota priekšā, tomēr cer iegūt lomu jaunākajā Tarantino filmā. Lai nopelnītu miljonu dolāru, viņš piekrīt piedalīties sava fana miljardiera dzimšanas dienas ballītē.

programme.title: Hipnotika
programme.desc: Apņēmības pilns atrast savu pazudušo meitu, detektīvs Denijs Rurks, izmeklējot virkni banku aplaupīšanu, attopas neparastu notikumu virpulī, līdz viņš sāk apšaubīt pat visvienkāršākos pieņēmumus par visu un ikvienu.

programme.title: Džokers
programme.desc: Artūrs Fleks - ballīšu klauns un neveiksmīgs stand-up komiķis - dzīvo nabadzīgu dzīvi kopā ar savu slimo māti. Kad sabiedrība viņu atstumj un uzskata par ķēmu, viņš nolemj pieņemt haosa pilno dzīvi Gotemas pilsētā.

programme.desc: Kad nāvējoša jaunu ieroču tehnoloģija draud izjaukt pasaules kārtību, īpašais aģents Orsons Fortūns un viņa komanda savervē vienu no Holivudas lielākajām filmu zvaigznēm, kam jāpalīdz slepenajā misijā.

programme.title: Acis plaši aizvērtas
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Dr. Bila Hartforda sieva Alise atzīstas seksuālās fantāzijās par kādu satiktu vīrieti, Bils kļūst apsēsts ar seksuālu kontaktu. Viņš atklāj pagrīdes grupu, apmeklē vienu no viņu sanāksmēm un ātri vien saprot, ko pārdzīvo.

programme.title: Saikne
programme.desc: Stāsts par seržantu Kinliju, kurš savā pēdējā norīkojumā Afganistānā nonāk komandā ar vietējo tulku Ahmedu. Kad viņu vienību patruļas laikā aplenc, Kinlijs un Ahmeds ir vienīgie izdzīvojušie, un Ahmeds riskē ar dzīvību, nogādājot ievainoto Kinliju drošībā.

programme.desc: Pēckara Londonā jaunā rakstniece Džuljeta mēģina atrast sižetu savai nākamajai grāmatai, taču viņai galīgi negribas rakstīt par kara šausmām, bet citi temati šķiet vai nu garlaicīgi, vai nepiemēroti. Viņai palīdz nejaušs gadījums - vēstule no kāda Gērnsijas salas cūkkopja.

programme.title: La La Land. Kalifornijas sapņi
programme.desc: Mia ir topošā aktrise, kas piestrādā kafejnīcā, pasniedzot latte kafijas filmu zvaigznēm. Viņas mīļotais ir Sebastians, džeza mūziķis, kas mēģina savilkt galus, uzstājoties ar koncertiem šaubīgos un noplukušos bāros. Panākumiem pieaugot, jaunais mīlnieku pāris saskaras ar lēmumiem, kas sāk graut viņu mīlestību. Sapņi, pie kuriem viņi strādājuši tik smagi, nu viņus var izšķirt!

programme.title: Meitene miglā
programme.desc: Īpašais aģents Vogels tiek nosūtīts uz attālu pilsētu nomaļā kalnu ielejā, lai izmeklētu sešpadsmit gadus vecas jaunietes pazušanas gadījumu.

programme.title: Bens ir atgriezies
programme.desc: Deviņpadsmitgadīgais Bens Bērnss aizbēg no rehabilitācijas centra un negaidīti atgriežas mājās tieši uz Ziemassvētkiem. Bena māte Holija priecājas satikt dēlu, taču raizējas, vai viņš neatsāks lietot narkotikas. Turpmāko 24 stundu laikā gaismā nāk dažādi noslēpumi, un māte dara visu, lai pasargātu dēlu no lielām briesmām.

programme.title: Grāmatnīca
programme.desc: Anglija, 1959. gads. Nelielā, konservatīvā Anglijas piekrastes pilsētiņā brīdvomātāja Florensa ir nolēmusi atvērt grāmatu veikaliņu. Modinot sabiedrību ar jaunāko grāmatu tirdzniecību, starp kurām ir arī Vladimira Nabokova "Lolita", viņai nākas sastapties gan ar pretestību no vietējās sabiedrības, gan atbalstu no īsteniem grāmatu mīlētājiem.

programme.title: Viņš un viņa
programme.desc: Sāra un Viktors ir kopā vairāk nekā 45 gadus. Kā viņi to izdarīja? Kas īsti ir Sāra, šī mīklainā sieviete, kura vienmēr ir bijusi sava vīra ēnā? Mīlestība, ambīcijas un noslēpumi veicina šī neparastā pāra odiseju.

programme.title: Kolete
programme.desc: Apprecoties ar populāro rakstnieku Villiju, Sidonija Gabriele Kolete no Francijas laukiem nonāk 19. un 20. gadsimta mijas Parīzes intelektuāļu vidē. Vīra pierunāta, Kolete kļūst par viņa rēgu rakstnieci un uzraksta daļēji autobiogrāfisku romānu par dumpīgu lauku meiteni vārdā Klodīne. Romāns gūst lielus panākumus, un Kolete saraksta vairākus tā turpinājumus. Koletes cīņa par radošajām īpašumtiesībām met izaicinājumu sabiedrības priekšstatiem par literatūru, dzimumu lomām, modi un seksualitāti.

programme.title: Lepnums un aizspriedumi
programme.desc: Kad Elizabete Beneta satiek izskatīgo misteru Dārsiju, viņa domā, ka viņš ir pēdējais vīrietis, ar kuru viņa jebkad varētu apprecēties.. Bet - abu dzīvēm savijoties, viņu tomēr savaldzina vīrietis, kuru viņa ir zvērējusi ienīst mūžīgi.

programme.title: Viņš un viņa
programme.desc: Sāra un Viktors ir kopā vairāk nekā 45 gadus. Kā viņi to izdarīja? Kas īsti ir Sāra, šī mīklainā sieviete, kura vienmēr ir bijusi sava vīra ēnā? Mīlestība, ambīcijas un noslēpumi veicina šī neparastā pāra odiseju.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone Plus?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone Plus filmām.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: After a head-to-head elimination battle testing simplicity, the 12 remaining chefs face a tricky taste test from judge Graham Elliot.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Cupcake Championship
programme.desc: Four cupcake connoisseurs battle it out in this cooking competition series, hoping to prove they are the supreme cupcake bakers and take home the $10,000 prize. Each of these contestants are undoubtedly talented cupcake designers, but there can only be one winner, and the heat is on to showcase their artistry and flair when it comes to baking these little sweet treats. Hosted by Kardea Brown, the show give the bakers new challenges to complete in each episode, with the poorest performing contestant eliminated at each stage of the competition, resulting in a final showdown between the very best.
