programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Cooking doesnt have to be difficult, nor does it require extravagant ingredients that are hard to find. From her home kitchen in Sweden, Rachel Khoo shares her secrets to cooking, providing viewers with delectable recipes created from easy-to-source ingredients, and guaranteeing enjoyment when it comes to rustling up dinner. Though her recipes are laced with simplicity, they are packed with flavour and she encourages viewers to recreate these mouthwatering fares.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Asian-Inspired Food. Joanna welcomes special guest Emma Lovewell into the kitchen to make traditional Asian dishes, including Japchae, yaki gyoza and egg drop soup.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Jos Faves. Joanna shares her all-time favourite recipes, including Chicken Cordon Bleu, Gruyere Potato Casserole, and Arugula and Dried Cherry Salad.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Mexican Cuisine. Joanna shares her recipes for spinach enchiladas with a side of Mexican rice and charro beans, queso blanco, fresh tomato salsa and churro cookies.

programme.title: Cupcake Championship

programme.desc: Tituss Burgess puts eight chefs to work making a welcome bite for guest Marcus Samuelsson. Next, the chefs are divided into teams for a new task.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Zombijzemē: Otrais šāviens
programme.desc: Nesaudzīgā un bezbailīgā zombiju mednieku četrotne dodas uz Amerikas vidieni, par savu jauno mājvietu atrodot Balto namu. Tur viņi stāsies pretī ne tikai jauna veida dzīvajiem miroņiem, bet arī citiem izdzīvojušajiem, kas nebūt nav draudzīgi noskaņoti. Turklāt viņu pašu vidū rodas nopietnas domstarpības.

programme.title: Jaunais vilks. Filma
programme.desc: Pasaulē parādījies šausminošs ļaunums, un vienīgi vilkači, kā Skots Makols, spēj saliedēt gan jaunos sabiedrotos, gan uzticamos draugus, lai cīnītos pret, iespējams, spēcīgāko un nāvējošāko ienaidnieku, kāds jebkad sastapts.

programme.title: After. Pēc kritiena
programme.desc: Tesa ir gatava jaunam dzīves posmam. Spožais prestižas koledžas diploms paver jaunas iespējas – meitene atrod sapņu darbu starptautiskā kompānijā. Viņas nodoms pārcelties uz Sietlu nemaz neiepriecina Hārdinu. Viņa neapmierinātība, pārmetumi un mūžīgā greizsirdība sāpīgi ievaino Tesu un rada bažas. Vai ir vērts visu likt uz kārts un upurēt daudzsološu karjeru? Taču kā lai aizmirst kopā pavadītās naktis un kaislīgos skūpstus, viņa ciešos vīrieša apskāvienus un tuvību, kas padara traku?

programme.title: Likteņa ironija
programme.desc: Nekustamo īpašumu aģente Margo un advokāts Grifins varētu būt ideāls pāris, diemžēl abi viens par otra eksistenci pat nenojauš. Turklāt dienu pirms Vecgada vakara Margo un Grifins iesāk ar lielām cerībām – viņiem ir īpaši plāni vakaram ar savām otrajām pusītēm. Taču liktenis visu saliks savās vietās: pēc jautras ballītes ar draugiem taksists Grifinu aizvedīs uz norādīto adresi, tikai... nepareizajā pilsētā! To, ka iekļuvis neīstajā namā, viņš sapratīs vien tad, kad mājās pārnāks Margo.

programme.title: Spārnos
programme.desc: Meža pīļu ģimene ir iestrēgusi rutīnā. Kamēr tētis Maks ir apmierināts ar to, ka viņa ģimene mūžīgi peldēs dīķī, mamma Pema vēlas parādīt visu pasauli saviem bērniem: dēlam Deksam un meitai Gvenai. Kad migrējoša pīļu ģimene piezemējas viņu dīķī ar aizraujošiem stāstiem par tālām vietām, Pema pārliecina Maku doties ģimenes ceļojumā caur Ņujorku – uz tropisko Jamaiku!

programme.title: Lils, Lils, Krokodils!
programme.desc: Pēc pārcelšanās uz Ņujorku Primmu ģimene atklāj, ka viņu jaunās mājas bēniņos dzīvo Lils, dziedošs sālsūdens krokodils, kuram garšo kaviārs, patīk iet vannā un klausīties mūziku. Ar Lilu ātri sadraudzējas Primmu dēlēns Džošs, bet, kad krokodila eksistenci apdraud ļaunais kaimiņš, Primmiem jāapvienojas ar Lila harismātisko īpašnieku Hektoru Valenti, lai parādītu pasaulei, ka tajā ir vieta arī lielam, dziedošam krokodilam ar vēl lielāku personību.

programme.title: X+Y
programme.desc: Zēns, matemātikas ģēnijs ar saskarsmes grūtībām dzīvē un vienaudžu vidū, rod pašpārliecību un jaunus draugus starp britu skolēnu komandas biedriem Starptautiskajā matemātikas olimpiādē.

programme.title: Džūdija
programme.desc: Leģendārā Džūdija Gārlenda 1968. gada ziemā ierodas Londonā, lai uzstātos izpārdotu koncertu sērijā.

programme.title: Dzīve
programme.desc: Šī ir filma par kādu parastu vīrieti, kuru gadiem ilgi nomākusī biroja rutīna novedusi līdz eksistencei ēnā. Tā dēļ viņš pēdējā brīdī pieliek vislielākās pūles, lai pārvērstu savu garlaicīgo dzīvi par kaut ko brīnišķīgu.

programme.title: Mošķu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Kas jauns mošķu pasaulē? Kāzas! Ragana un viņas iemīļotais Renfīlds, grāfa Drakulas sulainis, nolēmuši neslēpt savas jūtas un... salaulāties! Taču nupat sākusies laulību ceremonija tūdaļ pārtrūkst. Viesu acu priekšā mīlētājus nolaupa ar pārcilvēciskām spējām apveltītā mošķu medniece Mila. Šai mazulītei labāk netuvoties. Viņa ir ātrāka par vēju un apgādāta ar vismodernākajām tehnoloģijām - tās ieraugot, pat Džeimss Bonds viņu apskaustu.

programme.title: Relikviju mednieki
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par vērienīgākajām dārgumu medībām pasaules vēsturē. Pārsteidzoša Otrā pasaules kara karavīru komanda saņem pavēli izglābt nacistu nozagtos mākslas šedevrus un atgriezt tos īstajiem īpašniekiem. Uzdevums šķita neizpildāms, jo mākslas darbi atradās aiz ienaidnieka līnijas, un Vācijas armijai bija pavēlēts pēc Reiha krišanas iznīcināt absolūti visu. Vai tad muzeju direktori, kuratori un mākslas vēsturnieki, kuri labāk pārzināja Mikelandželo darbus, nevis ieročus, varēja cerēt uz izdošanos?

programme.title: Vīri melnā: Globālie draudi
programme.desc: Vīri melnā ir slepena organizācija, kas sargā Zemes mieru un drošību. Tā ne reizi vien ir aizstāvējusi cilvēci no Visuma neģēļiem. Bet šoreiz viņiem būs jātiek galā ar lielākajiem līdz šim pieredzētajiem globālajiem draudiem – spiegu viņu pašu rindās.

programme.title: Ielu karaļi
programme.desc: Losandželosas policijas departamenta veterāns Toms Ladlovs (Keanu Rīvss) ir pieredzējis ļaunāko, kas redzams uz ielām. Kad viņa pārinieks iet bojā, viņš ielu vardarbību sāk uztvert personiski. Ladlovam uzdod saukt sava pārinieka slepkavu pie atbildības, taču policijas kapteinis (Forests Vitakers) ir noraizējies, ka karstgalvīgais izmeklētājs ir pārāk personiski iesaistīts lietā. Ladlovs nolīgst jauno slepkavību nodaļas izmeklētāju Diskantu, lai sadzītu pēdas viņa pārinieka slepkavām Losandželosas ielās.

programme.title: Stabilizators
programme.desc: Izbijušais ASV specvienības kareivis Makkals ir inscenējis savu nāvi, lai dzīves atlikušo daļu pavadītu mierā, dzīvojot klusu dzīvi Bostonā. Tomēr no šī plāna nākas atteikties, kad viņš satiek jaunu meiteni Teriju, kura nonākusi nežēlīgas un vardarbīgas krievu mafijas rokās - tādā situācijā Makkals nespēj vienkārši noskatīties. Skaidrs, ka viņam meitene jāglābj, un nākas atkal ķerties pie ieročiem un darīt to, ko viņš prot vislabāk.

programme.title: Bastīlijas diena
programme.desc: Straujajā un spraigajā trillerī Bastīlijas diena būs spiesti sadarboties divi pavisam dažādu jomu profesionāļi. Viens no viņiem ir CIP slepenais aģents, pieredzējis tik daudz, ka ar to pietiktu krietnam simtam parastu mirstīgo, otrs – nevainojami savu amatu apguvis kabatzaglis. No viņu sekmīgas sadarbības atkarīga speciālo dienestu aģenta turpmākā karjera, zagļa brīvība, miers visā Parīzē un pat stabilitāte pasaulē.

programme.title: Slepkavas kodekss
programme.desc: Kad Anna bija bērns, viņu no nāves izglāba leģendārais slepkava Mūdijs. Apguvusi sava glābēja arodu, Anna ir kļuvusi par vienu no prasmīgākajām pasūtījuma slepkavām pasaulē. Kad Mūdijs tiek nogalināts, viņa nozvēras atriebties un nogalināt to, kurš atņēmis dzīvību cilvēkam, kurš viņai iemācījis visu.

programme.title: Iepazīstieties, spartieši
programme.desc: Viņu vairs nav 300, bet, neskatoties uz to, varonīgais spartiešu karalis Leonīds ir pieņēmis persiešu izaicinājumu un ved kaujā salašņu grupu, kurā ir 13 spartieši. Sacenšoties dažādās realitāšu šovu disciplīnās ar neparedzamajiem persiešiem un viņu pavēlnieku Kserksu, kurš izskatās aizdomīgi līdzīgs Borata producentam Azmatam Bagatovam, Leonīds pat vēl nenojauš par slēptajām persiešu rezervēm.

programme.title: Mārlijs un es
programme.desc: Džons īsti nevēlas bērnus, tāpēc draugs ierosina viņam iegādāties kucēnu. Tā šķiet lieliska ideja, un Džons ļauj draudzenei Dženijai izvēlēties viņu jauno četrkājaino draugu. Labradoram Mārlijam ienākot ģimenē, sakas īsta jautrība un piedzīvojumi, jo apburošais kucēns izraisa īstu haosu un nekārtību. Drīz vien pārim piesakās arī pirmais mazulis, un pēc tam – vēl viens. Ģimenes mīlulis un palaidnis Mārlijs nav prognozējams, taču ienes ģimenē daudz prieka un pozitīvu emociju.

programme.title: 200 % vilks
programme.desc: Kad Freda Lupina vēlēšanās piepildās ne tā, kā viņš to paredzējis, vilciņš pārvēršas par vilkati un uz Zemes nonāk palaidnīgs Mēness gariņš. Nu Fredijam jādara viss, lai atjaunotu kosmisko kārtību, pirms Zeme sadursies ar Mēnesi.

programme.title: Marija
programme.desc: Marija Kallasa, pasaulē izcilākā operdziedātāja, pavada savas dzīves pēdējās dienas 1970. gadu Parīzē, saskaroties ar savu identitāti.

programme.title: Bitīte Maija: Medus spēles
programme.desc: Bitīte Maija ir patīkami satraukta, jo tuvojas slavenās Medus spēles. Varbūt beidzot spiets tiks izraudzīts dalībai? Taču bitītes satraukums izgaist, kad viņa uzzina, ka strops nepiedalīsies spēlēs, turklāt puse ražas būs jāatdod spēļu dalībniekiem. Maijai tas šķiet netaisnīgi. Bez stropa karalienes atļaujas viņa grasās lidot uz Zumtropoli pie imperatores un lūgt atļauju stropam piedalīties spēlēs.

programme.title: Trakās ķepas. Leģenda par Henku
programme.desc: Henks varbūt ir necils suns, taču viņš ir apņēmības pilns kļūt par samuraju. Suņuks dodas uz valsti, kur čum un mudž no kaķiem. Tur Henks satiek nejauko kaķu karavadoni Iku Ču un arī Džimbo, kurš reiz bijis varens samurajs. Džimbo paņem Henku savā paspārnē un iemāca viņam, ko īsti nozīmē būt samurajam. Dzimstot pirmajai īstajai draudzībai starp kaķi un suni, abiem nākas glābt Kakamučo no ļaunā Ika Ču.

programme.title: Atmiņas par nākotni
programme.desc: 1914. gadā, laužot pieņēmumus par sievieti tā laika sabiedrībā, Vera Britena kļūst par Somervilas koledžas studenti Oksfordā. Sākoties Pirmajam pasaules karam, viņas brālis Edvards, līgavainis Rolands Leitons un draugi Viktors un Džefrijs tiek nosūtīti cīnīties frontes priekšējās līnijās. Arī Vera ziedojas un atstāj koledžu, lai dotos līdzi un pievienotos brīvprātīgo mediķu organizācijai, rūpējoties par ievainotajiem un mirstošajiem kareivjiem Londonā, Maltā un Francijā.

programme.title: Pie visa vainīga mīlestība
programme.desc: Žoslēns ir veiksmīgs biznesmenis, toties mīlas dzīvē – patmīlīgs brunču mednieks. Kad viņš mēģina jau atkal savaldzināt jaunu sievieti, izliekoties, ka ir ratiņkrēslā, viņa iepazīstina Žoslēnu ar savu māsu, kura patiešām piesaistīta dzīvei ratiņkrēslā.

programme.title: Klātbūtne
programme.desc: Ģimene ir pārliecināta, ka jaunajā piepilsētas mājā viņi nav vieni.

programme.title: Gaismas impērija
programme.desc: Iespaidīgs un aizkustinošs stāsts par cilvēciskajām attiecībām, kino burvību, izcilu angļu dzeju un 80. gadu populāro mūziku. Ar šizofrēniju sirgstošā Hilarija (Olīvija Kolmana) strādā pilsētiņas kinoteātrī un ir spiesta samierināties ar sava priekšnieka Elisa kunga (Kolina Fērta) aizskarošo uzvedību. Visi par to zina, taču neviens neiejaucas. Tomēr viss mainās, kad darbā tiek pieņemts jaunais Stīvens. Neskatoties uz vecuma starpību, abi iemīlas.

programme.title: Elizeja
programme.desc: 2154. gadā pastāv tikai divas cilvēku šķiras: ļoti bagātie, kuri dzīvo uz drošas kosmosa stacijas, sauktas par Elizeju. Un pārējie, kuri mitinās uz pārapdzīvotās un daļēji nopostītās Zemes. Planētas iedzīvotāji vairs nav spējīgi cīnīties pret noziedzību un trūkumu, kas apņēmis zemi. Ir tikai viens cilvēks, kuram rodas iespēja vienādot šo divu pasauļu dzīvi, un viņu sauc Makss - vienkāršs puisis, kuram par katru cenu jānokļūst Elizejā. Kamēr viņa dzīvība karājas mata gala, viņš uzņemas bīstamu misiju, stājoties pretī Elizejas varenajiem. Ja viņam paveiksies, viņš izglābs ne tikai savu dzīvību, bet arī miljoniem cilvēku, kuri mitinās uz Zemes.

programme.title: Īlaijas grāmata
programme.desc: Pa postapokaliptisko zemi, kas reiz bija Amerika, ceļo kāds vīrs. Caur tukšām pilsētām, izpostītām autostrādēm - pa zemi, kas pārvērtusies pelnos. Šeit nav civilizācijas un nekādu likumu. Ceļi pieder bandām, kas nogalinās cilvēku par pāri kurpju vai malku ūdens. Taču sacensties ar vientuļnieku nav pa spēkam nevienam - Īlaija pieveiks ikvienu, kas to izaicinās. Tomēr viņš necīnās par savu labklājību, viņam ir misija, ko viņš apņēmies veikt līdz galam.

programme.title: Motorsports: FIM Spīdvejs GP. SON. 1/2 fināls
programme.desc: The Speedway of Nations is a one-a-year speedway event every time held in a different country. Several national teams compete with each other, every team is represented by two riders, and there is one reserve, that can be used at any time.

programme.title: MOTO GP. Japānas GP sacīkstes
programme.desc: Get all the action and cutting edge stories, results and reports from the motorcycling event in Japan that is part of the Grand Prix motorcycle racing season.

programme.title: NFL. Washington Commanders - Atlanta Falcons
programme.desc: All the action of the National Football League 2020-2021.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. FC Bayern - Crvena zvezda
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Partizan - Olimpia Milano
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: MOTO GP. Indonēzija. 1. treniņbrauciens
programme.desc: Coverage of the Indonesian motorcycle Grand Prix, an important motorcycling event which forms part of the Grand Prix motorcycle racing World Championship. The MotoGP race features some of the most successful motorcycle riders.

programme.title: MOTO GP. Indonēzija. Treniņbrauciens
programme.desc: Coverage of the Indonesian motorcycle Grand Prix, an important motorcycling event which forms part of the Grand Prix motorcycle racing World Championship. The MotoGP race features some of the most successful motorcycle riders.

programme.title: Motorsports: FIM Spīdvejs GP. SON. 1/2 fināls
programme.desc: The Speedway of Nations is a one-a-year speedway event every time held in a different country. Several national teams compete with each other, every team is represented by two riders, and there is one reserve, that can be used at any time.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Panathinaikos - FC Barcelona
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: LaLiga. Real Madrid - Villarreal
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. Weder - St.Pauli
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: UFC 320: Magomed Ankalaev vs Alex Pereira
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Fix My Flip

programme.title: Tiny House, Big Living
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

The worst performing team member is eliminated from the show after each project, with the last team member standing taking home a $50,000 prize.

It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: A young couple with a baby on the way asks Jenn to make their beautiful midcentury modern home more functional while staying true to its original 1950s style

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: Jenn helps a couple taking a second chance renovate their forever home. Plus, two parents want to transform their office-slash-bedroom into a child-free oasis.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous: Welcome Inn
programme.desc: Follow married couple Dave and Jenny Marrs as they undertake a challenging renovation project, transforming a 19th century historic home into a bed and breakfast. As soon as they saw the property in Bentonville, Arkansas the idea was born. The financial stakes are high, as the place has been abandoned for a long time, but Dave and Jenny are determined to turn it into an inn of their dreams. Join as we follow their journey every step of the way in detail, as they face various issues, from construction to bee infestation and a lot more.

programme.title: Chasing the West
programme.desc: Two Texas business owners turn to the brothers to find a large home. Plus, a Hollywood couple realise country living isnt for the faint of heart.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: In a quick transformation with no demo required, Joanna creates an indoor garden-feel in the living room, dining room and breakfast nook of a home.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: With her youngest child, Crew, moving to the big kids room, Joanna expands her kitchen into Crews old bedroom and creates the pantry of her dreams.

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.desc: Jessie and Tina buy a home in the Echo Park area of LA discover there is a second house on the property. Will this flip attract buyers and make a profit?

programme.title: Vintage Flip
programme.desc: Jessie and Tina flip a 1902 cottage in Tinas hometown of Upland, California. They find its lost nearly all of its original Victorian details.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: Captivating docu-reality series in which Rebecca Budig shows viewers some of the worlds most amazing, luxurious and extraordinary water featured homes. You will have a chance to see what happens when you combine creativity, ingenuity and lots and lots of water when she takes us on a tour of cool properties such as a private water parks, islands and lakes, luxury houseboats and yachts with every amenity imaginable including a private crew.

programme.title: First Home Fix
programme.desc: Raisa and Austin renovate a 100-year-old home and reconfiguring it to meet the needs of its first-time homeowners will stretch their design limits.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Back in Las Vegas, the guys are ready to hit the jackpot. With the home field advantage, Chum beams at a lightbulb trick from Vegas own Mr. Electric, while Rick kneels on a stool from Queen Elizabeth IIs coronation.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum rev up their engines and roll into Detroit, Michigan. With their favourite experts in tow, Rick suits up for some samurai armour and tries to drive down the price of a luxury car collection.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: The hunt for extraordinary deals heats up as Rick, Corey, and Chum make their way down to Mesa, Arizona. Rick encounters a rugged Big Willy Jeep, Chum fangirls over some 2010 Justin Bieber trading cards, and Corey is struck by some Napoleonic medals.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did ocean scientists discover an unknown life form? Is blurry video of a mysterious creature in the snow the best Yeti footage out there? Did a Las Vegas family have a close encounter with ten-foot-tall aliens in their backyard?

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: American Pickers is an American reality series that follows ingenious "pickers" Mike Wolfe, and his business partner, Frank Fritz, as they hunt down objects with historical, collectible and pop culture value. They travel around the United States to buy or "pick" various items for resale, for clients, or for their own personal collections. Danielle Colby is in charge of their office of Antique Archaeology.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum rise from the ashes and start anew in Phoenix, Arizona. Along the way, Rick check out rare vintage Americana items, Chum checks out a mid-century furniture collection, and Corey gets in the ring for some boxing memorabilia.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum journey to St. Paul, Minnesota, where they unearth an impressive trilobite fossil collection. Then, Rick grows a heart for a first edition "Tin Woodman of Oz" book, and Chum offers his two cents on an ancient coin collection.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens

programme.title: Ancient Aliens Special Presentation
programme.desc: Across nearly every continent on Earth we can find similar remarkable stone structures of unexplainable engineering feats. Might the building of these megalithic sites have been directed by an extraterrestrial hand?

programme.title: The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe
programme.desc: Humanity has worshipped the Sun since the beginning of time, and yet even with our modern technology, we still know so little about it. Could unlocking the mysteries of the Sun be the difference between life and death for human civilization?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island

programme.title: Ancient Aliens Special Presentation
programme.desc: Across nearly every continent on Earth we can find similar remarkable stone structures of unexplainable engineering feats. Might the building of these megalithic sites have been directed by an extraterrestrial hand?

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: In Texarkanas marshy swamp, a legendary beast haunts a small Arkansas town, immortalised in "The Legend of Boggy Creek". Violent nocturnal attacks and remarkable tracks left fear and panic in its wake.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Breaking Mysterious
programme.desc: Join host Jimmy Church and his team of truth-seeking investigators as they examine some of the biggest mysteries, extraordinary phenomena and unconventional conspiracy theories in America. Episodes include investigating a plot to assassinate President John F. Kennedy just weeks before his actual, tragic assassination in Dallas with vital new information being obtained from one of the Presidents secret servicemen; debating the possibility that a popular virtual smartphone game could actually be part of a CIA mind control operation; or tracking the events when a nuclear weapon goes missing off the coast of Georgias Tybee Island. Follow the team as they seek disclosure, answers and the truth in this adventurous series.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Discovering the final resting place of Cleopatra is a lifelong passion for many an archaeologist. Now Zahi has permitted some to dive into the Mediterranean Sea and bring up a nine-ton pylon that is a confirmed part of her shrine.

programme.title: Engineering an Empire
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted by Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University, that explores the engineering and architectural achievements that were characteristic of some of the greatest civilizations on this planet - Rome, Egypt, Greece, the Aztecs, the Maya, Russia, China, the Persians, the Byzantines, Britain, France, and Italy in the late 15th and 16th centuries. Using interviews with experts, re-enactments, and computer-generated graphics, this programme looks at various structures, buildings and mechanical inventions, from Menes dam built in around 3000 BC in Egypt to the worlds first locomotive invented in Britain.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2

programme.title: Ross Kemp: Deep Sea Treasure Hunter
programme.desc: Have a look at the history series and its four episodes telling us how Ross Kemp, presenter and journalist, is making his life-long dream come true. He dives down on shipwrecks to uncover hidden stories and recover true treasures and mysterious stories hidden behind. Neil Brock is his personal guide and dive supervisor providing him a special intensive training course. Expert divers Emily Turton and Mallory Haas accompany Ross along his exploration around various parts of the UK.

programme.title: How the Earth Was Made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: In Search Of Aliens is an American TV series following Giorgio Tsoukalos, a writer, ufologist, television presenter and producer. He is a proponent of the pseudoarchaeological theory that ancient alien astronauts interacted with ancient humans. He takes the viewers on a paranormal journey, suggesting that aliens made contact with primitive humans long time ago and there is such evidence as Indian Sanskrit texts, describing flying machines called Vimanas; Jewish Zohar writings describing a "manna machine" similar to chlorella algae processing of today and many more. He explores the fascinating evidence behind the Earths most famous mysteries.

programme.title: The Tesla Files
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates mysteries surrounding the work of inventor Nikola Tesla, one of the most important and eccentric scientists in history. In the late 19th and early 20th century, Nikola Tesla invented alternating current, developed radio and cell phone technology, conceived of wireless electricity, remote control and electric cars, and devised a mega-weapon more deadly than the atomic bomb. Researcher Marc Seifer, astrophysicist Travis Taylor, and investigative journalist Jason Stapleton try to unravel the mystery of Teslas missing files, which were confiscated by the US government after he died in 1943. Did they contain his plans for free worldwide electricity? Or his designs for a death ray? Tune in and find out!

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: "Missing in Alaska" investigates the region of northwest Alaska, where over 20,000 people have vanished in an area locals call the Alaska Triangle. In all these cases, the bodies are rarely discovered. Who or whats behind these cases is unknown.

programme.title: Last Night in...
programme.desc: Investigations of real-life murders which occurred during nighttime in different towns across America. Individuals who find themselves alone in the dark become targets of horrible predators who are looking for an opportunity to kill. In the morning their loved ones are looking for them desperately.

programme.title: A Body in the Basement
programme.desc: When friends find Brad McGarry shot dead in the basement of his Ohio home, evidence suggests a robbery but soon a more complicated motive emerges.

programme.title: Dead Silent
programme.desc: This docu-series takes the viewer on a disturbing psychological journey into the dark and foreboding world of true crimes carried out in lonesome and desolate locations. From hikers hearing a twig snap in a remote forest, to a mysterious stranger disrupting a fishing trip at an isolated campsite, or a young couples desperate fight for survival at a secluded lovers lane, this series examines the terrifying reality of being alone in a life-threatening situation. Each episode focuses on one specific case and uses eyewitness accounts from survivors, expert analysis from criminologists and psychologists, and commentary from local authorities to provide context and authenticity to these truly horrifying tales.

programme.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn
programme.desc: Documentary series presented by the journalist Paula Zahn. Speaking to people connected with real-life crimes and looking at actions surrounding these shocking events, Zahn aims to uncover the truth behind true crime cases.

programme.title: I Almost Got Away With It
programme.desc: Different crimes, different stories one clear motive: to stay out of prison. This series profiles true stories of the accused, who tried to avoided arrest and capture for their crime. Almost getting away with it. Following these convicts and their attempts and successions of escaping American prisons after being sentenced. Some are on the run for only a week, others evade the law for years and in rare cases even for decades. What pushed these fugitives to crime and to what extent are willing to go to avoid justice.

programme.title: Most Evil
programme.desc: Crime documentary series in which forensic psychiatrist Dr. Michael H. Stone examines the roots of human evil by exploring acts committed by infamous criminals and ordinary people which he rates on scale of evil that he developed. His scale ranges from Category 1, which are those who kill in self-defense, to the Category 22, the serial torturer-murderers. Series also includes interviews with various neurologists, psychologists, and other forensic psychiatrists in an attempt to examine and profile the minds of killers. Partial re-enactments are also shown along with news footage, evidence, and reports from people who were somehow linked to the murderers and cases.

programme.title: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: As we all know, the initial verdict in a trial is not always the final outcome as many trial jury decisions are often overturned on appeal. However, the appeals process can take a significant amount of time to go through the system and also incur enormous costs on the individuals involved. This show follows the work of two investigators who re-examine the verdicts in contentious murder cases and assess the prospects of a successful appeal for the families of the people convicted of the crimes to determine if they should appeal or accept the verdict. Each episode traces the developments in the case, whether it be new evidence or witness testimony, which can then shed light on the innocence of the convicted person or show that, indeed, they are guilty of the crime and the verdict was correct.

programme.title: Serial Killer: The Devil Unchained
programme.desc: In November 2016, Kala Brown was found chained to a wall on Todd Kohlepps property. After she witnessed the murder of her boyfriend, Kohlhepp kept her as his prisoner for two months. Upon her liberation by police, Kala Brown tells investigators that Kohlepp has killed many more people. Eventually charged for the murder of seven individuals, Kojlepp was given a life sentence for each of his victims. Despite confessing to the seven murders he committed, Kohlepp calls investigative journalist, Maria Awes, and claims he killed even more innocent people. Alongside FBI investigator, John Douglas, Awes sets out to confirm if Kohlepp is telling the truth, uncovering the chilling extent of his brutal crimes in this three-part documentary series.

programme.title: Twisted Sisters
programme.desc: True-crime documentary series exploring chilling crimes committed by sisters. Produced by Khloe Kardashian, possibly one of the most famous sisters in the world, and no stranger to sibling conflict, the series explores cases where sisters have worked both in tandem and against each other. With interviews from law enforcement officials involved in the respective cases at the time of investigation, Twisted Sisters reveals the chilling brutality of these violent atrocities, and shows how officers unraveled the sisters relationships to help them solve the case.

programme.title: Shadow of Doubt
programme.desc: When it comes to crimes and killings not everything is crystal clear; perceptions on the them can be vastly different, depending on who you ask. This documentary series examines a number of complex and mystifying cases, where opposing viewpoints point to alternate suspects and culprits. We listen to differing accounts from individuals potentially involved in the crimes, whose contrasting opinions enshroud the case in a shadow of doubt, before revealing the shocking truths about each one. The series exposes what truly happened in these chilling cases, showing theres always more than meets the eye.

programme.title: Seduced To Slay
programme.desc: A couple on a murderous crime spree leaves a bloody trail, from Speedway, Indiana, to Texas. Police race to catch them before they strike again.

programme.title: Seduced To Slay
programme.desc: Growing family tensions take a brutal turn in Lafayette, Colorado, after a single mum vanishes. An anonymous tip tells police where to find her body.

programme.desc: When two friends disappear and another is murdered, their mums join forces to try and solve three terrible mysteries. Are these three cases connected?

programme.title: Swamp Murders

programme.title: The Shadows Of Death
programme.desc: After an innocent person is murdered, those closest to them, whether family members or friends, cant help but feel a surge of guilt entwined with their grief, as they reflect on whether they could have done more to prevent their death. American Monster reveals the truth behind some of the most shocking crimes thats happened around the country. Through dramatization and never-seen-before footage, each case shows you that anyone can be a monster, but it also allows us to understand how they became monsters. Through testimonies of family members and friends, along with home videos showing them at their most innocent, this true-crime drama gives us a closer look at the double life of some of the most ruthless monster in American history.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Disappeared is an American documentary TV show that contains dramatic re-enactments and interviews with law enforcement officers, investigators, and relatives connected with cases in which individuals have gone missing without a trace. The stories are heartbreaking and unbelievable, the families of people who have gone missing never give up hope. Some cases have tragic endings, some are heartwarming, but most of them are still open which makes the agony of the families go on.

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: A 20-year-old disappears on the long drive home from her fiances place. Investigators suspect that someone from law enforcement might be responsible.

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: Two 20-year-olds suffer personal tragedies then have their own lives abruptly taken. Will their families be able to prove what really happened?

programme.title: The Dead Files
programme.desc: The American paranormal television series focuses on investigations by retired homicide detective Steve DiSchiavi and psychic communicator Amy Allan. The two never communicate during investigation, they study the cases of crimes separately, and only coming to certain conclusions compare their results. Their methods of work are completely opposite: Steve uses common sense, documents, talks to real people, and Amy relies on her sixth sense and her ability to communicate with ghosts and spirits.

programme.title: Ghost Loop
programme.desc: Follow a team of highly specialized paranormal experts, who help both the living and the dead and focus on a distinct type of haunting - ghost loop, which happens when paranormal entities terrorize the living through endless and repetitive supernatural cycles, manifesting again and again in the same location. In each episode, paranormal investigator and medium Sean Austin, empath Kris Star, researcher and tech advisor Chris Califf, design specialist Eric Vitale, and tech support Matt Lytle, examine and research their clients property and history. Then, they formulate a plan they believe will help stop the haunting - whether its building a 1900s-era train compartment, replicating a tavern from the 1850s, or constructing a 19th century babys nursery. The team uses emotionally charged settings to draw out the entities in hopes that it will release the energy and break the loop once and for all.

programme.title: Ghost Bait
programme.desc: Enter the paranormal world of Bob Magill and Tina Storer, two pioneering investigators who delve into mysterious hauntings and happenings across the United States. Both Bob and Tina experienced ordeals with ghosts at a young age, and used these frightening encounters to learn how to overcome their paranormal fears. In this reality series they help frightened citizens do the same. Following Bobs unique methods, they conduct investigations in homes where residents are adamant they are haunted. They use their findings to heighten their clients sense of fear, in turn drawing out the entities that prey on anxiety. Bob And Tina show their clients that the only way to tackle these forces is to embrace their fears.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Ghost Hunters is an American paranormal and documentary reality TV series. The hosts are Jason Hawes and Grant Wilson, plumbers by day, paranormal investigators by night. They are in charge of TAPS- The Atlantic Paranormal Society- a group of ordinary people interested in getting to the bottom of otherworldly disturbances. Together with their team Jason and Grant research supposed paranormal activity, from Mason, Ohios Kings Island amusement park to the Philadelphia Zoo. The purpose of the show is not to prove that a place was haunted, but the opposite. There is a healthy dose of scientific approach in each investigation.
